questions.question: Which running trend actually exists?
options: Silent Running (Running without music or talking)

questions.question: Spot the real cycling class:
options: Blacklight Cycling (Cycling in the dark with black lights)
Cinema Cycling (Cycling while watching a movie)

questions.question: Which is a real aquatic workout?
options: Shark Swim (Swimming workout with a shark fin)
Bubble Aerobics (Aerobics in a bubble suit in water)

questions.question: Pick the actual martial arts fusion class:
Which unusual yoga class can you actually attend?
options: Fire Yoga (Yoga near an open flame)
Heavy Metal Yoga (Yoga with Heavy Metal music)
Sky Yoga (Yoga in a simulated sky environment)
questions.correctAnswer: Heavy Metal Yoga (Yoga with Heavy Metal music)

questions.question: Determine the real strength training trend:
options: Ice Fitness (Working out in a room made of ice)

questions.question: Which of these is a real group fitness class?
options: Jungle Gymnastics (Gymnastics inspired by jungle movements)
Bungee Workout (Workout with a bungee harness)
Mirror Dance (Dance in front of a mirror with light effects)
questions.correctAnswer: Bungee Workout (Workout with a bungee harness)
